*[[IgniteNet ML2.5-60-BF-18]] - ''Metrolinq 2.5G Outdoor 60GHz PTMP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML2560 HEDML2560] (2017-09-29) - (ETH/USB 3.0/SFP) • [[Accton]] :CPU: [[NXP]] ([[Freescale]]) [https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/arm-based-processors-and-mcus/qoriq-layerscape-arm-processors/qoriq-layerscape-1043a-and-1023a-multicore-communications-processors:LS1043A LS1043A] (SE7MNLB) @1.6GHz Quad Core :LAN: [[Aquantia]] ''AQrate'' AQR109 (2.5GbE), [[Realtek]] RTL8211FS (1GbE) :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - USB 3.0 ::"142000001731X REV:0B", "PER805-02", "1736" • [https://fccid.io/HEDML2560/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-3618807 PCB] :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 - 802.11ac (5GHz) Mini PCIe Module ::"P/N:142000001633X REV:R01", "1733", "IgniteNet" (28:76:10) *[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' (USB 3.0) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26) • [[Accton]] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - X710 (?) ::"142000001731X REV:0B", "PER805-02", "1736" - [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601/External-Photos/External-Photos-3616968 PCB]

===See also=== *[[IgniteNet ML-60-10G-360]] - ''MetroLinq 10G Tri-Band Omni'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML10G360 HEDML10G360] (2018-03-21) / HEDML60PRS4601 (x3) <!-- :CPU: [[Freescale]] ([[NXP]]) [https://www.nxp.com/products/processors-and-microcontrollers/arm-based-processors-and-mcus/qoriq-layerscape-arm-processors/qoriq-layerscape-1043a-and-1023a-multicore-communications-processors:LS1046A LS1046A] (SE8T1A) @1.6GHz Quad Core :Flash: ''Micron'' MT29F4G08ABBEAH4:E (4GB) - NQ356 ::''Macronix'' MX25U12835FMI-10G (16MB SPI) :RAM: 4x ''Samsung'' K4A4G165WE-BCRC (2GB) :LAN: [[Freescale]] QorlQ LS1046A (10GbE), [[Realtek]] RTL8211FS (1GbE) :WLAN: 3x [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) - USB 3.0 :2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 - 802.11ac (2.4/5GHz) Mini PCIe Module --> *[[IgniteNet ML-60-LW]] - ''MetroLinq LW Cloud Enabled 60GHz PTP/PTMP'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60LW HEDML60LW] (2018-01-30) - ''w/ 5GHz Failover + 2GHz AP'' <!-- :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 @710MHz (Quad Core) WiSoC • [https://www.balticnetworks.com/ignitenet-metrolinq-lw-60ghz-cloud-enabled-ptp-ptmp-w-5ghz-failover-2ghz-ap.html BN] :WLAN: [[Peraso]] PRS4601 (BB/MAC/PHY) + PRS1151 (RFIC) (USB 3.0) :LAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8072 (1GbE) / HEDML60PRS4601 --> *[[IgniteNet ML2.5-60-BF-18]] - ''Metrolinq 2.5G Outdoor 60GHz PTMP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML2560 HEDML2560] (2017-09-29) / HEDML60PRS4601 :*[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18BF]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' ::FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HEDML60PRS4601 HEDML60PRS4601] (2017-10-26) *[[IgniteNet ML-60-30-18]] - ''Metrolinq Outdoor 60GHz PTP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML6035G3 HED-ML6035G3] (2016-05-11) / HED-ML60MDSB :*[[IgniteNet RDO-60-FB-USBB-18]] - ''Metrolinq 60GHz Module'' ::FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML60MDSB HED-ML60MDSB] (2016-05-05) *[[IgniteNet ML-60-35]] (-1) - ''Metrolinq Outdoor 60GHz PTP + 5GHz'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/HED-ML6035 HED-ML6035] (2015-12-31)
